actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Air Quality.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Energy and Air Quality

official_title: To extend the deadline for commencement of construction of a hydroelectric project in Pennsylvania.

summary.text: Authorizes the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission, upon licensee request, to extend the time period during which the licensee is required to commence construction of a specified hydroelectric project in Pennsylvania for three consecutive two-year periods.Allows for reinstatement of an expired license.

titles.title: To extend the deadline for commencement of construction of a hydroelectric project in Pennsylvania.
